price: Sesungguhnya (agama Tauhid) ini adalah agama kamu semua; agama yang satu 972 dan Aku adalah Tuhan-mu, maka sembahlah Aku.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
footnotes: 972.  Maksudnya, sama dalam pokok-pokok kepercayaan dan pokok-pokok syariat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-uʿ'budūni
